Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Kennedy Expressway
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Ashland, Division, Elston and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Kennedy Expressway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Ashland, Division, Elston and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Kennedy Expressway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 79th, and the Red Line, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 79th, and the Red Line, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.
